summary:
TechContact produces a wide range of business and technical documentation for various industries and markets. Internationally oriented and multilingual, backed by extensive experience in writing for a variety of professional fields, TechContact stands for:


HIGH QUALITY
Correct and clear documentation that adds value to the product and the business.

EXCEEDING EXPECTATIONS
Efficient approach to writing that ensures timely and quality deliverables.

TOOLS AND FORMATS
Use of different software tools that allow output to multiple file formats.

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
Advice and professional technical support that our customers can rely on.

profile_positions.description:
TECHNICAL WRITING
Professional writing skills certified by the Cambridge University and proper understanding of the subject matter.

TECHNICAL TRANSLATIONS
Delivering technical translations in English, Dutch, German and Russian languages.

SOFTWARE TRANSLATION
Providing software translation and localization services in English, Dutch, German and Russian languages.

TEMPLATE DEVELOPMENT
Developing templates for technical documentation in multiple output formats.

BUSINESS ADVISOR
Strong business acumen built at the Nyerode Business University with specialization in Business and IT.

BUSINESS STEERING DOCUMENTS
Updating your business with contemporary knowledge in management and marketing.

STRATEGY
Developing your strategy in correspondance with contemporary
theories.

QUANTITIVE METHODS FOR BUSINESS
Justifying business decisions by applying quantitative methods.
profile_positions.title: Founder
